dcterms:creator: Tri Nguyen
Mir Rosenberg
Xia Song
Jianfeng Gao
Saurabh Tiwary
Rangan Majumder
Li Deng
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset consisting of real anonymous questions from the Bing search engine and 8.8 million candidate passages for passage reranking. The training set contains about 500,000 positive query-passage pairs, with each query having one relevant passage on average. The development and evaluation sets contain 6,980 and 6,837 queries respectively, with relevance labels provided only for the development set.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO Passage Ranking

dcterms:creator: Ellen M. Voorhees
dcterms:description: A newswire collection dataset used in the TREC 2004 Robust track. It comprises 250 queries and 0.5 million documents, split into training, validation, and testing sets using a five-fold cross-validation approach. The dataset is used to evaluate document reranking models.
dcterms:title: TREC Robust 2004
